name: Ninja Star (jgregfong)
description:
Ninja Star is a 2D side-scrolling puzzle platformer featuring a ninja starfish. The goal of the game is to reach the objective of each level. In order to traverse the platforms, the starfish needs to cut off its’ arm to shoot the arm as a projectile, and then respawn a new body at the arm, proceeded by transmitting its’ soul to the new body. Momentum from the previous body is maintained into the new body, which contributes to the puzzle aspect of the game. Using the soul transmission mechanic, the player is able to reach unreachable platforms in order to reach the objective. 

This game is a product of the 2018 SGDA Global Game Jam.
